fields.summary: Add DBTokenStore support to HS2 delegation token

fields.description: The {{get_token(String tokenIdentifier)}} HMS thrift API fails when HMS is deployed in remote mode and when there is no token found with that tokenIndentifier. This could happen when an application calls a renewDelegationToken on an expired/cancelled delegation token. The issue is that get_token tries to return a null result values which cannot be done in Thrift. The API call errors out with {{org.apache.thrift.TApplicationException unknown result}} exception which is uncaught and HS2 thrift server closes the client transport. So no further calls from that connection can be accepted unless client reconnects to HS2 again.
fields.summary: get_token thrift call fails for DBTokenStore in remote HMS mode

comments.body: I don't think its a good idea to modify the public Thrift API now to return an Thrift wrapper object instead of String due to compatibility reasons. Attaching a simple a fix which returns empty string when token is not found.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12889808/HIVE-17659.01-branch-2.patch
